page.title: 18Events in Upottery
page.content: 1The villages of Upottery and Rawridge have a number of events . Each year a village fete is held in late July,with stalls, games and sports in the afternoon with an auction and tug of war in the evening. The same area near the Manor Room is also the venue for the Crazy Sports and Pram Races. There has been a biannual arts festival organised by the actress Miss.Lee who lives in the village.This has involved people such as Tom Baker,Jacqueline Du Pre,The Spinners, Stephan Grappelly,Timothy West Yehudi Menuhinand many others. The school has a fete in May, stages an entertainment each Easter and arranges dances in the Manor room. This year there was even a five mile fun run on New Years Day!
